/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway is divided into multiple lanes, with several cars moving in both directions. A red car stands out in the foreground, adding a pop of color to the otherwise gray day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. On either side of the road, trees and shrubs line the highway, providing a natural border to the scene. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the overcast sky and the greenery on either side of the road.
